local_intent: Perceive the white plate (detect or scan), compute and verify rim-pinch grasp, approach and align, execute Pick (with retry), and verify object in gripper.
assumptions: Camera or scan will locate the white_plate within allowed attempts
ComputeGraspPose returns a valid pose stored under white_plate_grasp
Approach path is collision-free for the approach and pick
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT grasp phase and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: perception fallback, grasp computation and verification, approach/alignment, pick with retry, and confirmation via ObjectInGripper.
